textContent: 🦠 Covid-19 is an infectious disease caused by a virus referred to as SARS-CoV-2. The reservoir of the virus is probably of animal origin.
😷 The duration of incubation of Covid-19 is an average of 5 days, with extremes of 2 to 12 days.
🙅🏾‍♂️ Currently there is no evidence to suggest contact lens wearers are more at risk for acquiring COVID-19 than eyeglass wearers.
🦠 The coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is caused by a virus, NOT by bacteria.
🙅🏾‍♀️ The prolonged use of medical masks when properly worn, DOES NOT cause CO2 intoxication nor oxygen deficiency
🚫 Based on available evidence, children DO NOT APPEAR to be at higher risk for COVID-19 than adults.
🙅🏾‍♂️ We DO NOT KNOW yet if people who recover from COVID-19 can get infected again.
🤱🏽 Women with confirmed or suspected COVID-19 CAN breastfeed if they wish to do so
🧪 Two kinds of tests for COVID-19 are available: Viral tests & Antibody tests.Viral test tell you if you have a current infection. An Antibody test tells you if you had a previous infection.
🌡️ Thermal/Temperature scanners CANNOT detect COVID-19. They are only useful in detecting people who have a fever (i.e. have a higher than normal body temperature).
ℹ️ For the general public, CDC recommends wearing gloves when you are cleaning or caring for someone who is sick. In most other situations, like running errands, wearing gloves is not necessary.
☁️ It is not yet known whether weather and temperature affect the spread of COVID-19.
😷 A cloth face covering is not intended to protect the wearer, but may prevent the spread of virus from the wearer to others.
🙅🏾‍♂️ There is NO EVIDENCE from the current outbreak that eating garlic has protected people from the new coronavirus.
🧴 If you live with someone sick, wear a mask and clean surfaces frequently, using disinfectant cleaners or wipes.
📏 Social distancing is deliberately increasing the physical space between people to avoid spreading illness (Staying at least six feet away, wearing masks)
🙅🏾‍♀️ There is no reliable evidence so far to suggest that cannabis can prevent, treat or cure COVID-19.
🙅🏾‍♀️ Alum has NOT BEEN SHOWN to be an effective alternative for sanitizer or disinfectants.
🙅🏾‍♂️ Vitamin C CANNOT prevent you from getting sick or from contracting COVID-19. It is neither a cure nor a prevention method for the virus.
🙅🏾‍♂️ There is no evidence that taking anti-HIV drugs will stop you getting COVID-19

👴🏿 👵🏾 Adults of 60 and older are especially vulnerable to severe illness if they get COVID-19. If an elder in your household develops symptoms such as cough, fever or shortness of breath, call your a doctor or urgent care facility for advice.
🧒🏽 The best way to prevent children from becoming sick with COVID-19 is to avoid exposing them to people who are (or who might be) sick with the virus
ℹ️ Poorly controlled diabetes in children can weaken the immune system, so parents and doctors should watch these children carefully.
🚫 The flu shot is NOT EFFECTIVE against the coronavirus (COVID-19)
🚫 The pneumonia vaccine DOES NOT protect against the coronavirus (COVID-19).
ℹ️ Cancer patients are among those at high risk of serious illness from an infection because their immune systems are often weakened by cancer and its treatments.
🤰🏾 Because current knowledge on COVID-19 and pregnancy is limited, it is not clear if just being pregnant will put you at higher risk.
ℹ️ Scientists do not know yet if having antibodies to the virus can protect someone from getting infected with the virus again, or how long that protection might last.
🧪 If you test negative for COVID-19 by a viral test, you probably were not infected at the time your sample was collected. However, that does not mean you will not get sick.
🚫 Exposing yourself to the sun or to high temperatures DOES NOT prevent the coronavirus disease (COVID-19). You can catch COVID-19, no matter how sunny, hot or humid the weather is.
🚫 Drinking alcohol does not protect you against COVID-19 and can be dangerous. The harmful use of alcohol increases your risk of health problems.
🙅🏾‍♂️Adding pepper to your soup or other meals DOES NOT prevent or cure COVID-19.
🚫 Drinking methanol, ethanol or bleach DOES NOT prevent or cure COVID-19 and can be extremely dangerous.
🙅🏾‍♀️ Cold weather and snow CANNOT kill the new coronavirus.

ℹ️ Globally, by {Insert Yesterday's date}, according to{Insert API source}, {Insert statistic pulled from API} cases of Covid-19 have been confirmed and {Insert statistic pulled from API} patients have died.
🦠 Most people who become infected with the virus have mild symptoms and may not know they are sick. A small number of older patients develop a severe form of pneumonia, which can lead to death.

👩🏾‍⚕️ If someone is showing any of these signs, seek emergency medical care immediately     * Trouble breathing     * Persistent pain or pressure in the chest     * New confusion     * Inability to wake or stay awake     * Bluish lips or face
🧒🏽 Children with asthma may have more severe symptoms from COVID-19 or any other respiratory disease, including the flu.
🧒🏽 While children are generally at lower risk than adults for severe infection from the virus, children with chronic liver disorders could experience more serious liver disease if they get COVID-19.
👃🏿👅 Early signs of the virus can also be loss of sense of smell or taste.
ℹ️ The likelihood of COVID-19 being spread on shoes and infecting individuals is very low.
🤧 Contagiousness starts with the appearance of symptoms, even a few days before for some people. This period of contagiousness would last longer in symptomatic people, especially when they cough.
ℹ️  Younger Adults Are at Risk too: They should take precautions so they don’t catch the coronavirus.
🚬 Those who vape may have early lung injury or inflammation, and if they become infected with COVID-19. More researh is being done.
ℹ️ Based on information about this novel coronavirus thus far, it seems UNLIKELY that COVID-19 can be transmitted through eating food
🐈🐕 At this time, there is NO EVIDENCE that animals play a significant role in spreading the virus that causes COVID-19
🚰 The virus that causes COVID-19 has not been detected in drinking water.
🏊🏽‍♂️ There is no evidence that the virus that causes COVID-19 can be spread to people through the water in pools, hot tubs, or water playgrounds
🚫 There have been NO DOCUMENTED CASES of sexual transmission of COVID-19
🤱🏽 Transmission of COVID-19 through breast milk and breastfeeding has not been detected to date.
ℹ️ Post-liver transplant patients are more susceptible to getting the coronavirus because they are immunocompromised.
ℹ️ Medications that suppress your immune system, which are used to treat conditions like multiple sclerosis (MS), may make patients more vulnerable to contracting the coronavirus.
🤰🏾 There is currently NO EVIDENCE that COVID-19 can pass from a pregnant woman to the baby during pregnancy or delivery.
🙅🏾‍♂️ COVID-19 IS NOT transmitted through houseflies, ticks or mosquitoes bites. To date, there is no evidence to suggest that.
🙅🏾‍♀️ 5G mobile networks DO NOT spread COVID-19.Viruses cannot travel on radio waves/mobile networks.
🙅🏾‍♀️ There is currently no vaccine to prevent coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). The best way to prevent illness is to avoid being exposed to this virus
🙅🏾‍♂️ There is currently no proof that chloroquine or any other drug can cure or prevent COVID-19.
🙅🏾‍♂️ There is currently no specific treatment – with demonstrated efficacy – against Covid-19.
🏘 In case of exposure to COVID-19, Avoid contact with those around you.
👨🏽‍⚕️ In case of exposure to COVID-19, Go to your doctor or to the emergency room If the symptoms worsen with breathing difficulties and signs of suffocation
🏠 In case of exposition to COVID-19, Limit travel to what is strictly necessary and avoid close contact with others.
🏠 People who have been exposed COVID-19 are advised to self-quarantine at least for 14 days
🚫 Over-the-counter medications DO NOT treat the COVID-19 virus itself.
ℹ️ Some over-the-counter medications can make you feel comfortable when you’re sick and treat COVID-19 related symptoms
ℹ️ There are currently no drugs licensed for the treatment or prevention of COVID-19.
🙅🏾‍♂️ Antibiotics DO NOT work against viruses, only bacteria.The new coronavirus (COVID-19) is a virus and, therefore, antibiotics should not be used as a means of prevention or treatment.
